deadlineReminderNoMore: No more reminder times can be set for today
dummyDataInsertMessage: Insert 1.5 years (548 days) of dummy data from today. Continue?
deleteAllDataMessage: All habits and logs will be deleted. Are you sure?
emptyHabitHint:
No habits yet.
Tap + to create your first one!
emptyHabitSubtitle: A small beginning changes the day
habitTitleHint: e.g. Drink 8 glasses of water daily
categoryEmpty:
No categories yet.
Tap + to add one!
deleteAllMessage: Are you sure you want to delete everything?
preReminderHint: Reminds you of today's habits at lunch and dinner
tutorial_step_1: This is a habit card. Expand to see today's cells.
tutorial_step_2: Tap empty cell for +1, tap filled cell for -1.
tutorial_step_3: Complete button appears here when you reach the goal.
tutorial_step_4: Tap + to add a new habit.
tutorial_step_5: Settings, backup, and categories are in the menu.
tutorial_step_6: View statistics and heatmap by habit.
alarmStatusSummary:
{count} habits with deadline, {alarmCount} alarms
(Check console for details)
tagEmpty:
No tags yet.
Tap + to add one!
notificationPermissionMessage:
Notification permission is required for alarms.
Please allow it in Settings.
statsOverallHint: Days when all habits were achieved
statsPerHabitHint: Achievement days and streak per habit
backupCooldownHint: Auto backup interval when habits change (minutes)
clearBackupAttemptHint: Trigger backup on next action (for testing)
restoreSameDeviceHint: Same device can restore without email
restoreConfirm: Restoring will replace current data with backup. Choose how to proceed.
restoreOptionBackupFirstHint: Backs up current data to server before restore.
restoreBackupFailedContinue: Current state was not saved. Continue with restore anyway?
restoreEmailRequired: Register your email first to restore on a different device.
autoBackupNotice:
When auto backup is on, your data will be backed up every time you leave the app.
(when it goes to background)
emailRegistrationHint: Register your email to restore on a new device.
changeEmailHint: Enter a new email and verify to change.
emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
verificationCodeSent: Verification code sent to your email
emailPrivacyNotice: Your email is used only for backup recovery. When you change devices, a verification code will be sent to this email for identity verification.
noBackupOnServerHint: No backup on server. Please run backup now.
